\chapter*{Shico Project}

This repository contains the code + models for the Shico v2 project. 

\section*{Two datasets}

\subsection*{Volkskrant}

The Dutch newspaper \emph{De Volkskrant} between 1945 and 1995. 

\subsection*{Tijdschrift voor Geschiedenis (TVG)}

122 editions of the Dutch journal for history ranging from 1886-2008
